Helper.Title: How does it work?
Helper.StepOne: Select the name of the output MIDI file.
Helper.StepTwo: Choose a backup tempo to use if the tempo recognition system fails.
Helper.StepThree: Specify from which measure the backup tempo should be applied.
Helper.StepFour: Force the use of the backup tempo, regardless of the results from the recognition system.
Helper.StepFive: Add or remove a tempo/measure pair as needed.
Helper.StepSix: Reset the form to enter new information or submit it to convert the sheet music into a MIDI file.
